parameters: I'm sorry, this is a fight I prefer not to take part in.
Stay close to me, or they might kill me!!
The town is completely under siege!
Get 'em, for fuck's sake, get' em!!
W-What are you waitin' for?? Why are they still alive??
Do I really have to do everything in this army??
I'm REALLY gonna have to do everything myself???
I've not forgotten the HUMILIATION you gave me back then!
HA HA HA YOU DIDN'T EXPECT, DID YOU, FOOLS??!
I've not forgotten the HUMILIATION you gave me back then!
Death to all who shall oppose Lord Skandar!!
